scripts.build:all: pnpm turbo run build transpile transpile:sync --filter=web-agent-frontend...
scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run build:all
scripts.dev:wasm: cargo watch -w runtime/src -s 'cargo component build --release --target wasm32-wasip2 --manifest-path runtime/Cargo.toml'
scripts.clean: cargo clean && pnpm turbo run clean
